# Client Brief: Acme Marketing Agency

## Company Information
**Company Name:** Acme Marketing Agency
**Business Description:** We help B2B SaaS companies scale their content marketing without hiring full-time writers.

## Target Audience
**Ideal Customer:** B2B SaaS founders and marketing directors at Series A-C companies ($5M-$50M ARR)
**Main Problem Solved:** They need consistent, high-quality content but can't justify hiring a full content team yet

## Customer Pain Points
- Inconsistent publishing schedule due to resource constraints
- Junior writers don't understand technical products deeply enough
- Content doesn't convert because it's too generic
- Founders spend too much time reviewing/editing content

## Brand Voice & Tone
**Brand Personality:** Direct, approachable, slightly witty
**Key Phrases:**
- "Ship faster, not harder"
- "Content that converts, not just clicks"
- "Your content team, without the overhead"

## Topics of Interest
- Content ROI and measurement
- Scaling content operations
- Technical content creation
- B2B content strategy

## Platform & Posting
**Target Platforms:** LinkedIn, Twitter
**Posting Frequency:** 4x weekly on LinkedIn, daily on Twitter
**Data Usage Preference:** Moderate - use stats when available but don't force it

## Personal Stories/Examples
- Worked with a Series B SaaS that went from 2 posts/month to 16 posts/month in 90 days
- Founder spent 15 hours/week editing content, now spends 2 hours approving
- One client's technical tutorial got 50k views and generated 200 demo requests

## Topics to Avoid
- General marketing advice (too broad)
- Consumer marketing tactics (not relevant to B2B)
- Social media growth hacks
